00115 #define ROUNDUP8(val) (((val) + 7)&0xfffffff8)
00116 #define MINIMUM(a,b) ( (a<b)? a :b)
00117 #define MAXIMUM(a,b) ( (a>b)? a :b)

00119 /**
00120  * Modular Exponentiation  
00121  * ME = b ^ e mod m 
00122  * NOTE :
00123  * 1.There must be at least one bit set in the most-significant word
00124  * of the modulus. The modulus must be odd.
00125  * 2. The exponent and base lengths must be less than to the modulus length.
00126  * 3. modulus length from 9 to 256 bytes is supported. 
00127  *
00128  * @param product    Output buffer of size mlen
00129  * @param base       base  
00130  * @param exponent   exponent
00131  * @param mod        modulus
00132  * @param len        len in 192 bit words
00133  * @param elen       length of exponent in bytes
00134  * @param mlen       length of modulus in bytes
00135  * @param blen       length of base in bytes
00136  **/
00137   int cvm_ModExp (uint64_t * product, uint64_t * base, uint64_t * exponent,
00138     uint64_t * mod, int len, int elen, int mlen, int blen);
00139   int cvm_ModExpCrt (uint64_t * product, uint64_t * base,
00140     cvm_rsa_key_t * rkey, int nonwalign);
00141   int _cvm_ModExpCrt (uint64_t * product, uint64_t * base,
00142     cvm_rsa_key_t * rkey, int nonwalign, int convert);
00143   int cav_mod_exp (BIGNUM * res, const BIGNUM * base, const BIGNUM * exp,
00144     const BIGNUM * mod, BN_CTX * ctx);
00145   int crypto_mult (uint64_t montmul, uint64_t arg);
00146   int crypto_init (void);
00147   int N3Random (int len /* in Bytes */ , uint8_t * output);
00148 #endif
00149 #ifndef OPENSSL_SYS_VMS
00150 #define X509_CERT_AREA      OPENSSLDIR
00151 #define X509_CERT_DIR       OPENSSLDIR "/certs"
00152 #define X509_CERT_FILE      OPENSSLDIR "/cert.pem"
00153 #define X509_PRIVATE_DIR    OPENSSLDIR "/private"
00154 #else
00155 #define X509_CERT_AREA      "SSLROOT:[000000]"
00156 #define X509_CERT_DIR       "SSLCERTS:"
00157 #define X509_CERT_FILE      "SSLCERTS:cert.pem"
00158 #define X509_PRIVATE_DIR        "SSLPRIVATE:"
00159 #endif
